name: Truist Financial Corporation
description: Truist Financial Corporation is one of the largest financial services holding companies in the United States, formed from the merger of BB&T Corporation and SunTrust Banks, Inc. in December 2019. Headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Truist offers a wide array of banking and financial services, including retail and commercial banking, investment services, mortgage banking, and insurance. The company aims to inspire and build better lives and communities through its commitment to service excellence and community engagement. With a focus on innovation, Truist is leveraging technology to enhance customer experiences and streamline operations. The bank has a strong presence across the southeastern and mid-Atlantic regions, boasting a network of branches and ATMs that provide convenient access to its services. Truist is also dedicated to corporate social responsibility, prioritizing sustainability initiatives and community development programs. Its mission is to make banking more accessible and to empower clients with financial knowledge and support. As a publicly traded company, Truist is committed to delivering value to its shareholders while fostering a culture of trust and collaboration within its workforce.
